description: This file contains CSS styles for managing themes in the interactive Tic Tac Toe frontend application. It defines variables for light and dark themes and styles for various components of the application, including logo animations and responsive design adjustments.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application class defining overall styles for the app's layout and theming.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: CSS styles related to the application logo, including animations.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header styles for the application, defining layout and background colors based on the current theme.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the application, including color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button which allows users to switch between light and dark themes.
